channel.title: Cran on A Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Cran on A Blog

item.title: Back to the Future
item.description: When you submit a package update to CRAN, they ask you to check some boxes confirming that you’ve done your due diligence on your submission: that it passes its checks. One confirmation is that you’ve addressed any failures on the CRAN package check page, which looks like this. This page is a window into one of the key features of CRAN: it runs continuous-integration tests of your package against multiple versions of R, on multiple operating systems, with the current version of your dependencies.
